headline: NLP Research Developer and Content Creator
summary:
I started coding on Neopets when I was around 13, and I have never stopped since! I took tech classes in High School with a fantastic professor who inspired me to choose tech as my career. Throughout my education, I tried to find which field in tech would light up a spark. I worked with ERPs. Later, I developed mobile applications, and then I worked on websites and front-end. However, I found my spark when I started working on machine learning. 

When I took my first machine learning course in 2018, I knew this is what I wanted to do for my career. Therefore, before even finishing my software engineering degree, I started my master's. My first research experience was about voice activity detection, and I collaborated on a publication at Interspeech. In my second year, I started working on using smartwatches to predict the severity of Parkinson's disease symptoms. 

I am just graduated in winter 2021 and I am currently looking for my first full-time opportunity!

experiences.title: Content Creator
experiences.description:
- Grew a community of over 80,000 followers across Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter.
- Wrote over 120 posts in French and English about tech, blogging, and women in technology.
- Grew organic traffic to +15,000 users/month by researching the best SEO practices.

Tools used: WordPress, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Sponsorships, and more.

experiences.company: Johns Hopkins Whiting School of Engineering
experiences.title: Visiting Graduate Student
experiences.description:
- Collaborated with researchers on the BEAT-PD challenge for Parkinson's Disease 
- Research with the Center for Language and Speech Processing.

experiences.company: Johns Hopkins Whiting School of Engineering
experiences.title: Undergraduate AI Researcher
experiences.description:
- Evaluated if we can correctly classify domains in challenging audio recordings
- Improved the DIHARD detection error rate by more than 10% (relative)
- Assessed the pipeline performance with different datasets and configurations

For the Sixth Frederick Jelinek Memorial Summer Workshop, I had the chance to work with a team of 20 researchers from around the world on "Speaker Detection in Adverse Scenarios with a Single Microphone". I worked on domain-adversarial training. I also participated in the Summer School on human language technologies that took place before the workshop.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description:
- Adapted state-of-the-art models for the business's specific needs

experiences.title: Member
experiences.description: Les Ingénieuses is a student club of École de Technologie Supérieure (ÉTS) whose mission is to promote and encourage girls and women to pursue careers in engineering.

experiences.title: President
experiences.description:
- Organized events for the club
- Created and document new processes to make the club sustainable
- Managed reunions and deadlines for the events

experiences.title: Vice President
experiences.description:
- Managed all the social media accounts 
- Organized events to promote women in engineering inside and outside ÉTS
- Organized meetings to follow the progress of the events we are organizing

education.degree_name: Master's degree in Information Technology Engineering

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Research scholarship
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Fonds de recherche Nature et Technologies (FQRNT)
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: This grant of $17,500/year was created to promote and financially help research in STEM. They are awarded based on the candidate's academic excellence, past experiences and potential in research, abilities to communicate research, and volunteering experiences.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Pierre Sauvé, ing. scholarship for promoting women in engineering
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Fondation de l'Ordre des ingénieurs du Québec
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: This scholarship is awarded to highlight the recipients' efforts in inspiring the next generation of women to have a career in engineering and recognizing the impacts their initiatives already had on the profession.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Lauréate Personnalité 1er cycle
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
This scholarship is awarded to undergraduate students who distinguished themselves by the extraordinary balance between academic results and their personal and social impact on society. Through their leadership and constant social engagement throughout their studies, they had a significant impact on society.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E8iLDGSrOuk

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Women Techmakers Scholars
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Awarded by Google to only 20 recipients in North America, this scholarship recognizes the efforts of exceptional students on their incredible academic performance, leadership, and the impact they had on their local community with their efforts to inspire more women to have a career in technology.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Lieutenant Governor’s Youth Medal
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Honorary distinction offered to Quebeckers who have a positive influence in their community through their school and community involvement. The medal recognizes commitment, determination and surpassing oneself.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Youth Recognition Award - Education
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
The Prime Minister of Quebec offers this national recognition to an individual who has distinguished themselves for their dedication to Quebec youth.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3RvqfR9IVzc

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Bourse Châpeau Les Filles
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: The scholarship Chapeau, les filles! underlines the willingness and work of women enrolled in a program that leads to the exercise of a profession where women are under-represented. I was a laureate in the category of Advanced Technology.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Nomination, Governor's General Academic Medal
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: The Governor General's Academic Medal is awarded to the student graduating with the highest grade point average from a Canadian high school.

accomplishment_courses.name: Data mining on text and and audiovisual data

accomplishment_projects.title: Girl Knows Tech
accomplishment_projects.description: Voici mon blog, créé pour approfondir mes connaissances en WordPress et écrire des articles sur la technologie et les femmes dans le milieu - juste pour le plaisir!

volunteer_work.title: Organizing Team
volunteer_work.description:
-  Responsible for all the social media communications before, during, and after the event

Women Techmakers is a program created by Google to celebrate International Women's Day and to highlight the talent of women in technology. Every year, over 200 global events are held in 52 countries. The Montreal event has on average 300 attendees.

volunteer_work.title: Work Group Women In Engineering
volunteer_work.description:

- Suggest actions to reach the objective of 30% of women in engineering for 2030
